text.section: Except as otherwise provided in this subtitle, a licensed physician may not employ or supervise an individual practicing athletic training without a license or without an approved evaluation and treatment protocol.

Except as otherwise provided in this subtitle, a hospital, an institution, an alternative health system, or any other employer may not employ an individual practicing athletic training without a license or without an approved evaluation and treatment protocol.
The Board may impose a civil penalty of up to $1,000 on a person who employs or supervises an individual without a license or without an approved evaluation and treatment protocol.
